title: Cooperative and Active Learning Workshop for Hybrid Science Education Activity Design

context.prior_knowledge: Hands-on experience with basic digital education tools and science curriculum instruction
context.additional_context: A course designed to enhance technology integration competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers in designing hybrid learning environments, combining real-time collaboration and self-directed learning activities using mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more strategies for integrating physical and digital spaces in hybrid science classes.
Learners can develop educational activity scenarios reflecting learner needs and technological tools through a collaborative design process.
Learners can apply at least two interaction techniques that promote active learning in mobile microlearning environments.

resources: AR/VR Sample Content for Science Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
